mapper.insert: insert into commodity(name, price, stock) values(#{name}, #{price}, #{stock})
mapper.select: select * from commodity where commodity_id>=( ((select max(commodity_id) from commodity) - (select min(commodity_id) from commodity)) * rand() + (select min(commodity_id) from commodity) ) limit #{count}
select * from commodity order by commodity_id limit #{offsize}, #{count}
